mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER(username, nikename, PASSWORD, register_ip, user_rank, user_sign, header) VALUES(#{username}, #{nikename}, #{password}, #{registerIp}, 0, #{userSign}, #{header})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM USER WHERE nikename = #{nikename}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM USER WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT user_id, username, nikename, user_rank, user_sign, header FROM USER WHERE user_sign = #{userSign}
SELECT header FROM USER WHERE username = #{username} OR nikename = #{username}
SELECT header FROM USER WHERE user_sign = #{userSign}

SELECT user_id, username, nikename, user_rank, user_sign, header, NAME, sex, birthday, register_ip, register_time, virtue, proverbs FROM USER LEFT JOIN information ON USER.user_sign = information.pertain LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
